properties.value: The ham boots are part of the H.A.M. robes uniform worn by Humans Against Monsters members. It is obtained from pickpocketing H.A.M. members or dropped by H.A.M. guards. When worn, players are slightly less likely to be kicked out of the H.A.M. Hideout when pickpocketing H.A.M. members, this increases the more pieces the player wears. Wearing this will not increase players chances of successfully pickpocketing.[1]

Item ID4310

The ham boots are part of the H.A.M. robes uniform worn by Humans Against Monsters members. It is obtained from pickpocketing H.A.M. members or dropped by H.A.M. guards. When worn, players are slightly less likely to be kicked out of the H.A.M. Hideout when pickpocketing H.A.M. members, this increases the more pieces the player wears. Wearing this will not increase players chances of successfully pickpocketing.[1]

They are also used in the quest Death to the Dorgeshuun.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
10 December 2014
(update)

The item was renamed from "Boots" to "Ham boots".

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • NPCs associated with H.A.M., such as members and guards, do not wear these boots. Instead, they wear brown shoes resembling leather boots.

[[File:Ham boots detail.png|left|100px]]
The '''ham boots''' are part of the [[H.A.M. robes]] uniform worn by [[Humans Against Monsters]] members. It is obtained from [[Thieving|pickpocketing]] [[H.A.M. members]] or dropped by [[H.A.M. guards]]. When worn, players are slightly less likely to be kicked out of the [[H.A.M. Hideout]] when pickpocketing H.A.M. members, this increases the more pieces the player wears. Wearing this will not increase players chances of successfully pickpocketing.{{CiteTwitter|author=Mod Ash|url=https://twitter.com/JagexAsh/status/751400357473947648|date=8 July 2016|archiveurl=https://archive.is/xoE62|archivedate=20 December 2019|quote=HAM kit doesn't reduce getting caught, but each piece makes you slightly less likely to be ejected after being caught.}}

They are also used in the quest [[Death to the Dorgeshuun]].
